sections.heading: 961.01-961.07 may be cited as the “Victims of Wrongful Incarceration Compensation Act.”
sections.text: 961.01-961.07 may be cited as the “Victims of Wrongful Incarceration Compensation Act.”

sections.heading: As used in ss. 961.01-961.07, the term:(1)“Act” means the Victims of Wrongful Incarceration Compensation Act
